description: Test that create issues warnings fails with multiple PNGs if there is a transfer function mismatch and assign/convert-oetf is used.
command: ktx create --format R8G8B8A8_SRGB --${mode}-oetf srgb --layers 2 input/png/colorspace_sRGB.png input/png/colorspace_${subcase}.png output/create/colorspaces_warning/png_transfer_mismatch_${subcase}_${mode}.ktx2
